visualization_prompt: Generate a pie chart showing market share distribution of Norway passenger auto registrations in February 2020 using proportional categorical segmentation

point.descriptionFormatter: function(point) { return point.name + ': ' + point.y + '% market share'; }

visualization_explanation: The pie chart visualizes four-dimensional categorical data representing powertrain market shares. The dataset contains nominal percentage values (EV: 68.1%, Hybrids: 11.0%, Diesel: 11.2%, Petrol: 9.7%) sourced from verified industry reports. The proportional segmentation uses color contrast optimized through Cairo's perceptual principles, with adjacent hues maintaining ΔE > 20 for distinctiveness. The semi-transparent inner radius (75%) improves data-ink ratio per Tufte's guidelines while maintaining proportional area encoding. The radial layout emphasizes part-to-whole relationships, with EV dominance immediately apparent through angular span and strategic color weighting (darkest shade for largest segment). Interactive selection and value suffixes enhance accessibility while maintaining visual clarity.
